name: Muzzarelli Farms
notes: Fourth-generation family operation, 350 acres, Primus Certified, non-GMO, solar-powered facility, supplies 30+ states including NYC, Boston, Philadelphia, LA

name: Atlantic Blueberry Company
notes: One of largest blueberry producers, 750+ acres, five fresh packing lines, PrimusGFS certified, family-owned 85+ years, also at 6200 Black Horse Pike, Mays Landing (609) 625-1154

name: D'Ottavio Produce
notes: Three climate-controlled coolers (50,000+ package capacity), 60x100 cooler, satellite irrigation, forced air cooling, picks/packs/ships within 12 hours, E&A Trucking subsidiary with 20+ tractors

name: Consalo Family Farms
notes: Family-owned grower, packer, shipper, importer, distributor, locations in Vineland, Newfield, Hammonton, Egg Harbor City, custom packaging and private label options

name: Dandrea Produce, LLC
notes: Established 1917, 150+ employees, grower-distributor with vertical integration, year-round fresh produce supply

name: Whalen Farms LLC
notes: 180 acres blueberries, 125 acres cranberry bogs, 395 acres conservation land, state-of-the-art packing facility, IPM (Integrative Pest Management), since 1985

name: American Cranberry Co.
notes: Family-owned producer and distributor in NJ Pinelands, custom packing/repacking services, wholesale boxes and bulk totes

name: Eastern Propak
notes: State-of-the-art cold storage and packing facility, Primus GFS and Organic certified, USDA cold treatment certified, 24/7 cold chain monitoring, forced air cooling, bar coding, RF tracking

name: JSM Blueberries LLC
notes: Owned by Sharon and Joe Montalbano (former Newark firefighter), established 2005, Jersey Fruit cooperative member, started with 10 acres in 1985

name: Glossy Fruit Farms
notes: Fifth-generation family farm established 1887, 500 acres, on-site farm market, Jersey Fruit member, blueberries start around June 12

name: Stoney Creek Blueberries
notes: Established 1970, family-owned 3 generations, 155 acres, 100% solar energy since 2011, drip irrigation (50% less water), state-of-the-art equipment, rigorous farm audits

name: Big Buck Farms LLC
notes: Certified organic and kosher, family-owned 25+ years, NOFA-NJ member, packs under Little Buck brand, Sunny Valley International exclusive sales/marketing, Jersey Fruit member

name: LoSasso Farms
notes: Family-owned since 1956, 21 acres, drip irrigation system, Jersey Fruit cooperative member

name: Pine Island Cranberry Co., Inc.
notes: Owned by Haines and Haines, Inc., 1,400 acres (largest cranberry farm in NJ), produces average 13 million pounds annually

name: Jersey Fruit Cooperative
notes: Established 1940, premier fruit marketing cooperative, member growers in Hammonton, Shamong, Egg Harbor City, Glassboro, Mullica Hill

name: Summer Wind Farms
notes: Certified organic Jersey Fresh vegetables, pickup at farm packing house north of Vineland

name: Cuttler Produce NJ
notes: One of largest wholesale produce warehouses in NJ, refrigerated delivery vehicles
